page.title: 10FARMING -WAVER FARM
page.content:
His milking apparatus is 30 years old. Mr. Pearson obviously takes pride in his farm.
{WAVER FARM} Waver farm was built in 1802.They only grow crops to feed the animals.The farm has been in the family for 50 years.It's a dairy farm but going back a few years it would have been mixed.The farm has only cows.The cows are milked twice a day.The cows give 2-3 gallons every time but when they are newly calfed they give twice that.The milk has increased over the past 10 years due to feeding.Most of the milk goes to Kendal,but that is what is not bottled by the farmer and his wife.The rest goes to Barrow Co-op after pasturising and bottling.
